Single_Select_and_Exit.Description: A demo of making a single selection and exiting.

Multiple_Selection.Description: A demo of selecting multiple items.

Update_Hosts_Files.Description: Updates hosts file with hosts and stuff.

General_Tasks.Description: The tasks can be performed by power users to perform site-wide functions

Mass_File_Rename.Description: Rename all files in a target directory.
Mass_File_Rename.ScriptText: 1..10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Progress -Activity 'Renaming files' -PercentComplete ($_/10*100); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 100}; Write-Progress -Activity 'Renaming files' -Completed

Mass_File_Deletion.Description: Delete all files in a target directory.
Mass_File_Deletion.ScriptText: 1..10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Progress -Activity 'Deleting System32' -PercentComplete ($_/10*100); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 400}; Write-Progress -Activity 'Deleting System32' -Completed

Generate_Icecream.Description: Generate more icecream than anyone knows what to do with.
Generate_Icecream.ScriptText: 1..10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Progress -Activity 'Generating Icecream' -PercentComplete ($_/10*100); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 100}; Write-Progress -Activity 'Generating Icecream' -Completed

Nuclear_Tasks.Description: Save these tasks for emergency situations.

Send_Warning_Shot.Description: Send a message to all domain-joined machines.

Launch_The_Nukes.Description: Don't worry, they nukes aren't real. They can't hurt you.

Throw_Ball.ScriptText: 1..10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Progress -Activity 'Playing with puppies' -PercentComplete ($_/10*100); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 100}; Write-Progress -Activity 'Playing with puppies' -Completed

Pet_Puppy.ScriptText: 1..10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Progress -Activity 'Petting puppies' -PercentComplete ($_/10*100); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 100}; Write-Progress -Activity 'Petting puppies' -Completed

Appologize_To_Puppies.ScriptText: Write-Host 'The puppies have forgiven you.' ; Sleep 2
